channel.title: Different Format
channel.description: Hello anyone reading this. So im new to 667 layouts, and im attempting to add a lobby to the server. Which is hard to do considering I can't find ActionButtonPackedHandler, or ActionSender. So if someone could give me some advice, I would appreciate it. Also, im trying to change what shows in the command prompt, because it gets to a point where the spam is so intense, I can't make anything out. Just seeing whos logged in and out would suffice. I'm also trying to add chatlogs, pm logs, etc. If you could point me in the right direction, I would be grateful. This new layout is completly different than what im used to. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Different Format
item.dc:creator: @The_Moparian The Moparian
item.description:
@The_Moparian wrote:

Hello anyone reading this. So im new to 667 layouts, and im attempting to add a lobby to the server. Which is hard to do considering I can’t find ActionButtonPackedHandler, or ActionSender. So if someone could give me some advice, I would appreciate it. Also, im trying to change what shows in the command prompt, because it gets to a point where the spam is so intense, I can’t make anything out. Just seeing whos logged in and out would suffice. I’m also trying to add chatlogs, pm logs, etc. If you could point me in the right direction, I would be grateful. This new layout is completly different than what im used to. Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
